title: My new discord server, the great depth of zaun
body:
Recently, i had a burrito and a milkshake while on a bus to costco, When I got back, my discord blew up, 20 ppl were messaging me"game?" it was... annoying as ****, so realizing the need to make a semi-server.... I did
https://discord.gg/WBc5mTp

what do we do?: we do FLEX TEAM finding and DUO partner finding and general team finding,we also do TF 2 trading and gaming.

Who can join: everyone from the above communities, we will add more variety in the future.
rules: on the discord server

rank requirements: lv 30 or higher

other info: we have a meme room, and we judge fairly.

https://discord.gg/WBc5mTp 
click if you are ready!
